subject: Olympic Games (2010)
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Thomas Greilinger drank and ate his way out of hockey, weighing 280 pounds and working in an office five years ago, before rededicating himself to the sport.
snippet: Thomas Greilinger drank and ate his way out of hockey, weighing 280 pounds and working in an office five years ago, before rededicating himself to the sport.
